activity.name: Guided Tour of the Station
activity.description: Take a guided tour of Canfranc Station accompanied by a knowledgeable guide who will explain its history and architecture.

activity.name: Hiking in the Pyrenees
activity.description: Enjoy beautiful hiking trails that start from the station and explore the mountain landscapes of the Pyrenees.

activity.name: Visit the International Railway Station Museum
activity.description: Explore the museum located at the station, which showcases the history and interesting facts about this iconic place.

activity.name: Skiing at Candanchú
activity.description: Take advantage of the proximity of Canfranc Station to the Candanchú ski resort and enjoy a day on the snowy slopes.
